Posts.Content: Brilliant brilliant news, you go enjoy your freedom from 'The Beast .......Always happy to hear success stories. Prayers said for your continued good health x
Posts.Title: Cancer free

Posts.Content: Hi all I started my chemo on Wednesday past......Im on Docetaxol, Herceptin and perjeta. I had the Herceptin and perjeta on Wednesday and Docetaxol on Thursday.     Thing is I'm a bit anxious, I know I shouldn't be but I can't help it........reason is that I have had very few side effects....i know I should be grateful but I'm wondering is something not working?? Sorry for my silliness x
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hey Lala1982, sorry to hear it's affecting you so horribly. What are you talking for the heartburn? I do feel a burning sensation in my throat, probably the start of something fun !!!
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi all the lovely ladies of the 'May Chemo club' can't say I'm happy to join you but here I am !! I'm starting my chemo on Tuesday, lovely triple of Docetaxol, Herceptin and perjeta, anyone here been or going on same concoction ?? I'm really starting to c##p myself and would love some friendly advice please xx
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Oh dear : ( guess I should just enjoy the peace then. Hope each day gets better for you Thanks for your replies ladies.....knowledge is power xx
